text: We are lost! Damn you Varus, you spineless coward!
Go! Get the standards out! The legions do not fail!
Rally, men! We're nearly clear of the forest!
Varus! Accursed coward! Push forward while he distracts the enemy!
You… you're on your own. Horsemen - with me! Double-time!
Keep moving! We must get through! Where is Arminius? Someone find Arminius! We need his auxiliaries!
We're under attack! Look to the eagles! Defend them! Hold on!
Move Silanus' army towards the village ahead.
Scout out the points of tactical interest on the battlefield.
Use the siege weapons on the walls to see off the attack.
The German will betray you. He will betray Rome!
No one knows. Even fewer care.
You are walking into a trap, Varus!
Varus… O! Quintillus Varus… give me back my legions!
Thank the gods we made it out of that infernal forest! May Nerio give strength to those we left behind.
But my loyalty is to my people.
Rome may have raised me, trained me.
Arminius? A traitor? I think not.
We are clear of the woods! The legions are preserved!
